verses.roman:
yadyapi kāhāra 'mamatā' bahu-jane haya
prīti-svabhāve kāhāte kona bhāvodaya

synonyms: yadyapi—although; kāhāra—of someone; mamatā—affection; bahu-lane—unto many persons; haya—there is; prīti-svabhāve—according to one's affection; kāhāte—in someone; kona—some; bhāva-udaya—awakening of ecstatic love.
translation: "Although one has affection for many persons, different types of ecstatic love awaken according to the nature of one's personal relationships.
